name: indoor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 happening, used, or existing inside a building: indoor sports/activities an indoor racetrack/swimming pool Opposite
outdoor
More examplesFewer examplesThe indoor flower market is a big tourist attraction.He has vaulted 6.02 m in indoor competitions this year.These slippers are just for indoor wear - you'll ruin them if you wear them in the garden.I always thought cyclamen was an indoor plant, but this is the tougher, outdoor variety.He's gone to play indoor football with his mates at the leisure centre.
